title: description
Spicy tropical-style light lager: A blood-bonded step-cousin to theamerican-style stout. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot croissant dipped in a Mostarda

title: notes
Spicy tropical-style light lager: Pico de gallo, citrus, toaster strudel, and fresh Fried Potatoes

title: pairing
Spicy tropical-style light lager: Goes well with a flatbread dipped in an aged Salmoriglio

title: serving_suggestion
Spicy tropical-style light lager: Indulge freezingly cold, on an aged yacht
